{"step_by_step_thinking": "The dental papilla is a part of the developing tooth, and the question is asking when the first nerve fibers appear near it. According to Document [20], nerves approach the developing dental papilla during the bud stage and form a basal plexus below the dental papilla in the early cap stage. Therefore, the first nerve fibers are present in the vicinity of the dental papilla in the bud stage.", "answer_choice": "A"}
